title.rendered: Get More Clients With This Million-Dollar Lead Conversion Plan

content.rendered:
Learn a Million-Dollar Lead Conversion Plan

Watch this webinar recording to learn about the effective lead conversion plan of industry veterans Dan and Tempe Perreira. This husband and wife team use their plan to consistently produce four to five million dollars in sales annually from just 40 leads a month. From the initial response to new leads to getting them to respond and become your clients, you’ll learn about the strategies and systems involved in the Perreiras’ million-dollar lead conversion plan.

Watch this webinar recording to learn about:

  • Lead follow-up strategies that set the Perreiras apart
  • Setting expectations and how to respond to rejection
  • Reengaging leads – how and why to follow up again
  • Post-sale relationship building that will sustain your business

Need More Leads to Convert Into Clients?

With Market Leader, you can tap into two sources of a guaranteed number of exclusive buyer and seller leads. These leads are more than just impressions – you can get a steady stream of buyers and sellers delivered directly to you. Check lead availability in your desired ZIP codes today!

Check Lead Availability
